short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest and most complete way to unsubscribe all your Youtube Channels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unsubscriby for YouTube is the only extension that does the job to unsubscribe all of your extensions in bulk easily, just follow the steps below.

**Unsubscriby for YouTube is the only extension frequently updated to function properly, the other completely free extensions are not.

** It does not collect any data nor require a Google account login or any sort of measures.

How it works:
1 - First, install this extension.
2 - Next, click on the gray YouTube icon next to your URL bar. Don't see the icon? Click on the puzzle piece, and then click on the pin to move it to your URL bar.
3 - Click on the "Unsubscribe!" button to start the process.
4 - The extension will navigate to your subs list, click "OK" on the popup message to confirm and start to unsubscribe. (If the popup doesn't show up, please refresh the tab then repeat steps 2 and 3).
5 - Wait until it finishes.

Tips:
- If you are using the Free Version, when it finishes, just refresh the page then do steps 2, and 3 to continue.
- If you want to stop the process while it is running, click on the gray YouTube icon next to your URL bar, then click on the "Stop!" button.
- Immediately after upgrading to premium, make sure to close or refresh the subscriptions page in order for the premium features to work properly.

Not working? Go to Support or email me so that I can address the issue.
